1a1fdade-ab65-4790-b4d0-127d66b41d07.description: This course is designed to provide an overview of the Stewardship Tier and its key functionality. Stewardship Tier Essentials is for any stakeholder of a data project. Candidates learn about the key features of this application, as well as how these features support the Syniti Solutions. This course is prerequisite to Stewardship Tier Foundations and all Syniti Solutions Learning Paths leading to a certification.
1a1fdade-ab65-4790-b4d0-127d66b41d07.name: Stewardship Tier Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Stewardship Tier Essentials course.

d67d479b-b83d-42c8-8470-0bbff0ba0791.description: This course introduces the concepts and features of the Syniti ADM Solution in the Stewardship Tier. Learners understand ADM how it is utilized in the Migration process. The course modules begin with Console and take you through each area of ADM. Learners understand the basic functionality and use of ADM. This course is prerequisite to ADM Foundations ADM Developer.
d67d479b-b83d-42c8-8470-0bbff0ba0791.name: ADM Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the ADM Essentials course.

1225d2cc-96fb-4e7f-873e-5bc882266f2d.description: Stewardship Tier Foundations is designed with the Business User in mind providing fundamental knowledge and skills for users and developers implementing Syniti Solutions. With hands-on exercises in a Learning Lab environments, this course is a prerequisite to all Syniti Solution Developer level courses leading to a certification.
1225d2cc-96fb-4e7f-873e-5bc882266f2d.name: Stewardship Tier Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Stewardship Tier Foundations course.

7f587d4b-8e16-4fbf-8bbf-d16e6f67ab0d.description: This course provides an in-depth look at the Design & Map components of ADM, and how to view reports delivered to your business. Using videos and labs candidates learn the functionality of these areas to use ADM to help capture the decisions made for a migration project. This course is prerequisite to the ADM Developer Course
7f587d4b-8e16-4fbf-8bbf-d16e6f67ab0d.name: ADM Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Stewardship ADM Foundations course.

83a1b53e-027f-445a-a0d0-d774cccd9bdc.description: The ADM Developer course focusses on those areas of ADM that only a Developer will work in. It starts with Console before it picks up where ADM Foundations left off, in AutoGen. From there the Developer will learn how to navigate and use Transform as well as processing data through Construct functionality. There is no loading to an ERP system performed in this course. Completion of this course is not equivalent to ADM Developer Certified status.
83a1b53e-027f-445a-a0d0-d774cccd9bdc.name: ADM Developer Course

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules and Learning Lab activities in the Syniti ADM Developer Course.

4bd5d196-5017-49c6-9f3a-042d6feedbc9.description: The Migrate Essentials course introduces you to the concepts and features of the Syniti Migrate solution on the Syniti Knowledge Platform (SKP). You will learn what the Migrate solution is and how it is utilized in the migration process. This course is for all stakeholders and is the first course in a series of three in the Migrate Learning Path.
4bd5d196-5017-49c6-9f3a-042d6feedbc9.name: Migrate Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Migrate Essentials course.

61294cef-14f3-43cc-a409-1ef5e9515e52.description: The Syniti Knowledge Platform (SKP) provides a holistic view from a single console across your data landscape, with key features to help you easily design and set data policies in your everyday governance work, without any programming. From the SKP you can access applications and services to manage your migration, quality, and governance projects in a single cloud-based location. The SKP Essentials course provides a high-level tour for anyone interested in learning about the platform.
61294cef-14f3-43cc-a409-1ef5e9515e52.name: SKP Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the SKP Essentials course.

62d4c6a2-6712-4a98-b372-8ec1979c36b6.description: MDM Essentials is designed to provide an overview of the Syniti Master Data Management (MDM) Stewardship Tier solution and its key functionality. The MDM Essentials course is intended for stakeholders of a data project that will include the Syniti MDM Solution as part of its implementation.
62d4c6a2-6712-4a98-b372-8ec1979c36b6.name: MDM Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti MDM Essentials course.

cb7e58c4-8d94-449e-9426-b56981fba9b8.description: Syniti's Migrate Solution is used to organize project-related data objects, implement data relevancy, and map your legacy data conversion objects to the desired future system. The Migrate Foundations course is for Business Users, Administrators, Developers, Implementers, and Technical Leads, delivering an understanding of how to implement core migration processes aligned to Syniti methodology and the Migrate solution process flow.
cb7e58c4-8d94-449e-9426-b56981fba9b8.name: Migrate Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Migrate Foundations course.

093981e8-9918-4ea0-9bd1-89bca424bac3.description: Syniti's Migrate Solution is used to organize project-related data objects, implement data relevancy, and map your legacy data conversion objects to the desired future system.The Migrate Developer course offers an in-depth hands-on experience on advanced topics introduced in the Migrate Foundations course. Administer and Snapshot Management, Value Mapping, Remediation, Promote Database Objects, and Construction. This course also introduces Central Relevancy.
093981e8-9918-4ea0-9bd1-89bca424bac3.name: Migrate Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Migrate Developer course.

c5963829-c1d2-45e7-a778-fd58d7c83e76.description: Syniti applications on the Stewardship Tier are built using this development platform technology. This course provides an understanding of the extensive features available in the Framework by creating a new WebApp and applying advanced development techniques. The exercises offer a solid foundation in understanding how our Migration, Quality, and Governance solutions are built and how they function. Completion of this course is not equivalent to the Syniti Framework Development Certified status.
c5963829-c1d2-45e7-a778-fd58d7c83e76.name: Framework Development Developer Course

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Framework Development Developer course.

96b20eb2-47ea-4ada-b54b-47664a288a1f.description: Syniti's Quality solution enables companies to report on the quality of their data in their ERP systems and find errors, inconsistencies, and integrity issues in master data. Quality is also an analytical tool that facilitates the gathering and publication of data quality metrics. To allow for the required flexibility, many of the reports can be built upon configurable tables.
96b20eb2-47ea-4ada-b54b-47664a288a1f.name: Quality Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Quality Essentials course.

ea9ed0e4-40bb-4646-bf97-ebcab53ff9bd.description: DemoJam is one of the most important activities in the Syniti year, as a celebration of the vast talent that we have across the globe and our constant quest to solve the most complex data challenges for our customers. This badge celebrates our “Jammers” and their effort to live up to core Syniti values by Staying Curious, Thinking Big and, in sharing their brilliance via DemoJam, helping us to be Stronger Together.
ea9ed0e4-40bb-4646-bf97-ebcab53ff9bd.name: DemoJam 2022 Participant

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is to recognize the participation in DemoJam. Because of Synizens with the spirit and enthusiasm for innovation, DemoJam is a huge success.

2cd49de8-a248-473a-9b36-40ac045a0fd9.description: MDM Request Page and Roles provides learners with a perspective of how the application functions for an end user. Candidates will learn the basics of a Request as well as how to process the Roles so that the data collected during the process posts to the target system.
2cd49de8-a248-473a-9b36-40ac045a0fd9.name: MDM Request Page and Roles

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the MDM Request Page and Roles course.

skills.name: MDM | Post Request to Target System

f2aeb84b-68a7-4438-8ca4-743781c003cc.description: Syniti Match is a module in the Syniti Knowledge Platform (SKP) and it is also a standalone application. The Syniti Match Tutorial introduces the Syniti Match solution and its key functionality, providing an understanding how to can use the features of this powerful Match technology to address complex data challenges in a modern business.
f2aeb84b-68a7-4438-8ca4-743781c003cc.name: Match Tutorial

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Match Tutorial.

2ae9ca68-5c05-45af-a2de-f187498153d5.description: The Master Data Management (MDM) Foundations course is designed with the Business User and the non-technical MDM System Administrator in mind. From a Business User perspective, candidates learn the fundamental knowledge required to create and submit requests, as well as how to perform tasks to create and change data in the workflow process. From an Administrator perspective, candidates learn how to create a new Business Process using existing components, including task pages and security.
2ae9ca68-5c05-45af-a2de-f187498153d5.name: MDM Enablement Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the MDM Enablement Foundations course.

skills.name: MDM | Building Blocks: Business Process, Scenario, Role, Task

419a6075-8cd7-408e-bbed-f0b5cf7c62f5.description: This comprehensive course is designed with the MDM Developer in mind. It has advanced exercises on how to build an end-to-end scenario, create and register SQL procedures, UX/UI changes, and reporting.
419a6075-8cd7-408e-bbed-f0b5cf7c62f5.name: MDM Enablement Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the MDM Enablement Developer course.

efcee652-a409-4c49-ac5a-2d4ff7ada9a4.description: DemoJam is one of the most important activities in the Syniti year, as a celebration of the vast talent that we have across the globe and our constant quest to solve the most complex data challenges for our customers. Our Jammers are great representatives for several of our core values, by Staying Curious, Thinking Big and in sharing their brilliance via the DemoJam events, helping us to be Stronger Together.
efcee652-a409-4c49-ac5a-2d4ff7ada9a4.name: DemoJam Regional Winner

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is to recognize The Regional Winners. By achieving this, they get to represent their regions at the Global DemoJam 2022 Finale. Because of Synizens with the spirit and enthusiasm for innovation, DemoJam is a huge success.

242056b4-57af-44c4-b0c6-7cd0df755e3f.description: The Manager 101 course introduces the responsibilities and expectations of being a people manager at Syniti. Learners discover what is required as a manger when it comes to topics such as communication and leadership styles, delivering feedback, and performance management. This course is for all people managers at Syniti.
242056b4-57af-44c4-b0c6-7cd0df755e3f.name: Manager 101

badge_template_activities.title: Completed required modules in the Syniti Manager 101 course.

0e7e5fa4-2c3e-4ac6-a7ac-7043bad07b10.description: DemoJam is one of the most important activities in the Syniti year, as a celebration of the vast talent that Syniti has across the globe and our quest to solve the most complex data challenges for our customers. At the Global DemoJam 2022 Finale, Regional Winners perform a virtual demo to show off the innovations they’ve created in front of a team of judges and with feedback from the event attendees. Three winners are crowned.
0e7e5fa4-2c3e-4ac6-a7ac-7043bad07b10.name: DemoJam Global Winner

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is to recognize The Global Winners, scores are based on originality, maturity, customer value, market value, and presentation. They are awarded for each of the categories - "Extension/Functionality", "Application" and "Outside the Box".

5703dab6-975e-4d05-a70e-7fbb4d62f3ea.description: DemoJam is one of the most important activities in the Syniti year, as a celebration of the vast talent that we have across the globe and our constant quest to solve the most complex data challenges for our customers. Our Jammers are great representatives for several of our core values, by Staying Curious, Thinking Big and in sharing their brilliance via the DemoJam events, helping us to be Stronger Together.
5703dab6-975e-4d05-a70e-7fbb4d62f3ea.name: DemoJam Regional Winner

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is to recognize The Regional Winners. By achieving this, they get to represent their regions at the Global DemoJam 2022 Finale. Because of Synizens with the spirit and enthusiasm for innovation, DemoJam is a huge success.
